channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Backlash Continues: Tech Company Pulls Ads From Olympics As Boycott Movement Grows
Vance rips Harris for questioning his loyalty to America: 'What the hell have you done?'
item.description: JD Vance returned fire to Kamala Harris after the Vice President questioned Vance's loyalty to his country at a campaign rally in Minnesota.

item.title: Trump: Harris Is 'Total Radical on Abortion'
item.description: As he has sought to do for months, Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump called out Democrats, and Vice President Kamala Harris in particular, as being "radical on abortion" and out of touch with the views of American voters.

item.title: Death Toll Climbs to 12 in Hezbollah Missile Strike on Golan Heights, Officials Worry of Wider War
Resurfaced 2023 video shows Kamala Harris arguing young people suffer ‘climate anxiety’
item.description: A video resurfaced this week of Vice President Kamala Harris arguing that young people experience "climate anxiety" that causes them to rethink buying a house or having a family.

item.title: Trump: 'Remember, I Sent National Guard to Save Minneapolis'
item.description: Making a passionate call for voters in St. Cloud, Minnesota, to help him flip the state after the 2020 riots, Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump inflected his voice with a rare tinge of disdain Saturday night.

item.title: Jen Psaki Finally Apologizes for Lying to Gold Star Families
US and world leaders denounce Paris Olympics opening ceremony's mocking of Last Supper
item.description: The 2024 Paris Olympic Games opening ceremony sparked outrage from U.S. and World lawmakers who denounced the event after drag queens made a mockery of the Last Supper.

item.title: N.C. Dems Sue to Reverse Decision That Put RFK Jr. on Ballots
item.description: The North Carolina Democratic Party has challenged the state election board's recent decision to recognize a new political party that will put Robert F. Kennedy Jr. on the state's presidential ballots.

item.title: Jarring Number of Defamation Lawsuits Have Corporate Media on Its Heels
Trump calls Kamala Harris' meeting with Netanyahu 'terrible and insulting'
item.description: Former President Trump, the Republican presidential candidate, called Vice President Kamala Harris' meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu "terrible and insulting."

item.title: Trump Ad Calls Out VP Harris as 'a Pro-criminal Extremist'
item.description: The Trump campaign released an ad before Saturday night's Minnesota rally, highlighting Vice President Kamala Harris' calling for donations to the Minnesota Freedom Fund during the riots of 2020.

item.title: 'Best and Worst States for Retiring Americans'—Are They Really, Though?
Pollster finds 'astounding change' in Democratic electorate since Harris' ascension
item.description: Enthusiasm about Vice President Kamala Harris running for president has supercharged her campaign and helped her close the gap with Trump within a week.

item.title: Trump: Forcing Biden Out 'Was a Coup of the Presidency'
item.description: On a 24-hour campaign trek from speeches in West Palm Beach, Florida, to Nashville, Tennessee, and St. Cloud, Minnesota, Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump denounced the "coup of and by the Democrats" against President Joe Biden.
